subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Michael Beasley, Mario Chalmers and Daequan Cook entered the N.B.A. draft early and found their way to Miami, transforming what was one of the league’s older rosters into one of its youngest.
snippet: Michael Beasley, Mario Chalmers and Daequan Cook entered the N.B.A. draft early and found their way to Miami, transforming what was one of the league’s older rosters into one of its youngest.
